# litllm

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `litllm` is to help you mine pdfs for scholarly analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of litllm from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("avahoffman/litllm")
```

## Getting started

```{r eval=F}
library(litllm)
```

```{r echo=F, message=F}
devtools::load_all()
```

`litllm` uses the OpenAI API. You'll need an API key to use it. Check that you have an API key saved in your environment:

```{r}
ll_check_api_key()
```
